page.title: 03CHURCH IN FLAX BOURTON
page.content: Since the two parishes of Flax Bourton and Barrow Gurney are quite small and join each other the Rector of Flax Bourton is also the Vicar of Barrow Gurney.He also is Chaplin at Barrow Hospital.The Flax Bourton church is dedicated to St. Micheal and all Angels.It is not very beautiful and is quite small.Barrow Gurney is quite the opposite.The two churches take it in turns to have services but the population who come is very few.There are many Church events including the fete,outings and jumble sale.Barrow Gurney church is dedicated to St.Mary and St. Edward.They both have a tower which you climb up winding stairs you have a lovely view of both parishes.
